Learning Rendezvous Limited

We are one of the leading international audio-visual suppliers/distributors of learning, training and educational resources to the corporate and educational markets worldwide.

ä½¿å‘½

We distribute Chinese Classics Digitized Databases: 1) to open and expand the doorway of knowledge 2) to provide future leaders with the tools and resources they need for exploration and improvement 3) to serve educators and professors helping them to improve their curriculum 4) to increase consciousness of the world and its current issues

We strive to be the source of imagination and wisdom, helping to broaden thinking, by making readily available to our clients informative academic programs and the latest educational technology.

Whether you wish to increase your knowledge and understanding or enhance your curriculum teaching, we can provide for all your needs, thanks to the vast range of topics covered by our extensive multimedia library.

We offer a wide range of audio-visual Learning videos, CD-ROMs, DVDs, VCDs and reference materials, designed to support self-paced learning and complement the teaching curriculum.
